item.description:
We need a minimum of 50 professionals and entrepreneurs to make our first event successful. So the date for Connecticut's first Black Professional Networking & Business Card Exchange is Wednesday, February 27, 2008 at 6pm at ????????. I know that there are many entrepreneurs and professionals out there who want to meet each other to build their businesses or expand their networks, so please let others know about this event. Let's pack the place out and support one anothers business.

Every month we will showcase professionals and entrepreneurs who will have an opportunity to give a presentation about their business or profession. Starting this month we will have at least one guest speakers to address us on a variety of business topics. Send all emails to markanthonyjenkins@yahoo.com to be a presenter at our upcoming events.

Keep in mind at our professional networking events you can Promote your Business, Meet other Black Professionals, Find Mentors, Meet Entrepreneurs, Find Business leads and referrals and Find Business referrals.
item.name: The Connecticut Black Professionals January Meetup
